00017    const QPixmap& pm, QWidget* parent) : QToolButton(parent)
00018       {
00019       setIconSize(QSize(ICON_SIZE, ICON_SIZE));
00020       id = _id;
00021       setPixmap(pm);
00022       QToolTip::add(this, tip);
00023       setToggleButton(true);
